Stixbox Function

NOM

    rbinom - Random numbers from the binomial distribution (inversion method)

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

X = rbinom(num,n,p)

PARAMETRES

    • num : positive integer or a vector [lig,col] of integers
    • n : nonnegative integer
    • p : probability
    • X : num-vector or a num-matrix of random numbers chosen from binomial distribution B(n,p)

DESCRIPTION

    Random numbers from the binomial distribution (inversion method)
